documentation: updated 10/7/2018, put city name in box for readability
updated 9/25/2018, change to standard Type 1 font, Helvetica
updated 3/24/2018, clearly mark the odd-even page layout scheme
(not used with interactive PDF)
updated 3/23/2018, alter top of page for optional links to index/toc
updated 2/7/2018, allow font specified in bulleted list
updated 2/4/2018, single column, etc, see notes in .java file
updated 5/24/2017 for project-agnostic, format-specific
NOTHING IN HERE will be specific to any project
COMMENTS ONLY HERE, data not used
Interactive PDF verion ONLY, not for commercial printing!
Rather than the following embedded fonts, we will just use Helvetica
start obsolete
CHANGE FONTS FOR EMBEDDING. This means referring
to Arial as main font, and using arial.ttf in the FOP
directory and configuration file. PrinterOrnamentsOne will
be referred to here and in prnoorg.ttf
end obsolete
the title_page has FO for the front matter, including
title page
front material
cover_page has ONLY cover page FOP
NOTE that preface will be handled from the 'preface_text' object!
for 'title_page', an array of strings, that will be printed, followed
by another array of front matter. first item in front matter is the FORMATTING
string, rest are the content, since each will be in the same format
cover_page:
<!-- inside the first flow of the document --><fo:block text-align="center">
<!-- cover image follows -->
<fo:external-graphic src="pics/PROJECT_COVER_IMAGE"  content-width="scale-to-fit" content-height="80%" />
</fo:block>
title_page:
<!-- start title page on new page --><fo:block page-break-before="always" font-size="48pt"
font-weight="bold"
space-after.optimum="20pt"
space-before.optimum="40pt"
text-align="center">
 PROJECT_TITLE
</fo:block>
<!-- subtitle --><fo:block text-align="center" space-before.optimum="40pt"><!-- subtitle --></fo:block>
<!-- author --><fo:block text-align="center"  space-before.optimum="40pt">by PROJECT_AUTHOR</fo:block>
<!--  end of title page -->
<!-- start front material on new page (no title) --><fo:block page-break-before="always"> </fo:block>
<!-- front matter will all be this format --><fo:block text-align="center"  space-before.optimum="40pt">
 PROJECT_FRONT_MATTER
page_head_DOCUMENTATION: Metadata for the FOP document. This information is
embedded in the final PDF file.
page_head:
<rdf:RDF xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#">
<rdf:Description rdf:about=""
xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/">
<!-- Dublin Core properties go here -->
<dc:title>PROJECT_TITLE</dc:title>
<dc:creator>PROJECT_AUTHOR</dc:creator>
<dc:description>PROJECT_DESCRIPTION</dc:description>
</rdf:Description>
<rdf:Description rdf:about=""
xmlns:xmp="http://ns.adobe.com/xap/1.0/">
<!-- XMP properties go here -->
<xmp:CreatorTool>Apache FOP</xmp:CreatorTool>
</rdf:Description>
</rdf:RDF>
static_header_comments: following REMOVED, for interactive PDF, this is misleading and
takes up too much space at top of each page.
it was located right after the PROJECT_TITLE text
static_header is split into 2 parts, one before the TOC links
and one for after. Will programmatically insert those links
static_header1:
<!-- title at top of page --><fo:static-content flow-name="xsl-region-before">
<fo:block>PROJECT_TITLE
preface_comments: first string in 'preface_text' is the section heading!!!
remaining strings are the text content, each string displayed in its own paragraph
preface_text: This is a version of the PROJECT_TYPE for reading with a PDF viewer, such as Adobe Reader (tm). The 'Index' and 'Table of Contents' provide page number references as well as clickable links. Note that most print versions of the PROJECT_TYPE are monochrome, but nearly all of the illustrations are in color.

Owners of the PDF electronic version may print their own paper copy, if they wish, in monochrome or color, depending on their budget and equipment. PDF users benefit from both color illustrations, as well as interactive features of the content. For instance, while reading the PDF electronic version with a tool such as the Adobe Reader (tm), you can read this PROJECT_TYPE in the normal linear fashion, moving from page to page. Note, however, that there are many clickable links that work like a web page. Clicking on blue underlined text will send you directly to the referenced item, such as an illustration or discussion point. The 'Index' and 'Table of Contents' are also made up of blue underlined links that will send you to the appropriate text or illustration. Interactive links to the 'Index' and 'Table of Contents' are provided at the top of each chapter section, for easy access. Depending on the PDF reader software used, you may be able to view and click on 'bookmarks' that mirror the 'Index' section. You may also be able to 'go back' to the hyperlink that you most recently clicked. Note that many of the illustrations are much higher-quality than they appear in the print version. Be sure to use the 'zoom' capability of the PDF reader to see greater detail in the covers and cancels.
boilerplate_documentation: the following are key/value pairs. This makes the actual format
of the FOP tags (XML) something we set here, rather than coding
directly in the Java. It is tiresome to use, as there has to be
a lookup each time we want the actual tag text. Much more flexible
boilerplate:
<fo:block page-break-before="always" font-size="16pt"
font-weight="bold"
space-after.optimum="10pt"
space-before.optimum="0"
text-align="center" id="

<fo:block  font-size="16pt"
font-weight="bold"
space-after.optimum="10pt"
space-before.optimum="10"
text-align="center" id="

<fo:block font-size="12pt"
font-weight="bold"
space-after="10pt"
space-before="14pt"
border="solid .1em #aaa"
text-align="center"
padding-top="5pt"
padding-bottom="5pt"
id="

<fo:block font-size="12pt"
font-weight="bold"
space-after="10pt"
space-before="14pt"
text-decoration="underline" id="

<fo:block font-size="12pt"
font-weight="bold"
space-after.optimum="10pt"
space-before.optimum="14pt"
text-decoration="underline" id="

<fo:block page-break-before="always" font-size="16pt"
font-weight="bold"
space-after.optimum="10pt"
space-before.optimum="0"
text-align="center"> </fo:block><fo:block text-align="center" space-before="40pt">(This Page Intentionally Left Blank)</fo:block>

<!-- defines page layout -->
<fo:layout-master-set>
<!-- layout for the title page -->
<fo:simple-page-master master-name="titlex">
<fo:region-body margin-top="25pt" margin-bottom="25pt" margin-left="20pt" margin-right="20pt" />
</fo:simple-page-master>

<fo:simple-page-master master-name="rest"
page-height="11in"
page-width="8.5in"
margin-top="0.5in"
margin-bottom="0.75in"
margin-left="0.75in"
margin-right="0.5in">

<fo:simple-page-master master-name="rest"
page-height="11in"
page-width="8.5in"
margin-top="0.5in"
margin-bottom="0.75in"
margin-left="0.75in"
margin-right="0.5in">
<!-- odd-even layout used for PRINTED PDF --><fo:page-sequence-master master-name="psmOddEven" >

<fo:conditional-page-master-reference master-reference="right"
page-position="first" />
<fo:conditional-page-master-reference master-reference="left"
odd-or-even="even" />
<fo:conditional-page-master-reference master-reference="right"
odd-or-even="odd" />
